abstract.para: &certmanager; is an extensible X.509 certificate controller for &kube; workloads. It supports certificates from popular public issuers as well as private issuers. &certmanager; ensures that the certificates are valid and up-to-date, and attempts to renew certificates at a configured time before expiry.
